name: Blazing Heat
description:
End Phase: Deals 1 Pyro DMG to attached character.
Usage(s): 1

When attached character has Sheer Cold attached, remove this effect.
descriptionraw:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deals 1 $[K103] to attached character.
<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color>

When attached character has <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C121022]</color> attached, remove this effect.
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deals 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG</color> to attached character.
<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>: 1</color>

When attached character has <color=#FFFFFFFF>Sheer Cold</color> attached, remove this effect.
